item.title: Park Hyatt ShenZhen
item.description: Park Hyatt ShenZhen Since successfully completing the Globalist challenge, I have gradually started experiencing Hyatt hotels. In Shenzhen, I only wanted to experience Andaz and Park Hyatt. Last Saturday, I stayed at Park Hyatt Shenzhen. I opted for a cash stay this time, and the price of 2100 RMB on a Saturday was considered reasonable, considering that hotel prices in Shenzhen tend to be higher on weekends. Park Hyatt ShenZhen Park Hyatt Shenzhen is located in the Annex Tower of Ping An Financial Center.
